data.name: Red Spider-OST
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

Red Spider 3 OST is added !

Additional Track List

  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Title "A Heroine Never Dies" composed by Yasunori Shiono
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Black Dog" composed by Yukio Nakajima
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Mission Furtive" composed by Yukio Nakajima
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Ruthless Clock" composed by Yukio Nakajima
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "A Heroine Never Dies(Piano Ver.)" composed by Yasunori Shiono
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Theme of Luk" composed by Yasunori Shiono
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Theme of Shawn" composed by Yasunori Shiono
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Theme of Dog Head" composed by Yasunori Shiono
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Theme of Lai" composed by Yasunori Shiono
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Theme of The Ghost" composed by Yasunori Shiono
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "Theme of Francis" composed by Yasunori Shiono
  • Red Spider3: A Heroine Never Dies Soundtrack "A Heroine Never Dies(Retro Mix)" composed by Yasunori Shiono


About the Game

Soundtrack of Red Spider Series.
